name: STRESSED DESSERTS
description: Anadromes are some of the weirdest and craziest phenomena within the English language. An anadrome is a word that can be spelled backwards like a palindrome, but instead of being the same exact word, it spells something completely different. I chose the anadrome of STRESSED / DESSERTS as way to process the anxiety of a year and a half of social distancing and everything that we all go through on a daily basis to stay safe from COVID19. Everyone has their own coping mechanism for stress. Some people became workaholics, some became gym rats, some it was learning a new trade or skill and millions of other variations. My go to for being stressed is eating a dessert; something sweet to wash away the pain. So this anadrome is the perfect analogy for my cycle of anxiety. When I feel like I'm going backwards and getting STRESSED, I move forwards by eating DESSERTS; figuratively and literally.
